page.title: 06BLACKO SCHOOL CHRISTMAS (1)
page.content: My most vivid memory is the School Concert and the decorations in the hall. A video tape of the concert is stored in our{DOMESDAY BOX}buried near school,I wonder if someone will watch it in 100 years from now!Our Pantomime was lots of fun and it was good to hear laughter from so many people at once. We had a Christmas Dinner and invited parents and friends to share this with us. We borrowed tables and chairs from the chapel and in the afternoon we all watched a video film for a treat. We had a party one evening and I remember doing the Conga all through school. We played games and danced. I liked it when everybody danced Agadoo and we were all out of time. After the party we all set off to go Carol Singing around the village.................... {(continued on Page 7)
